entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
